profile:
Kovar Contracting provides roofing, siding, eavestrough and soffit/fascia services in the greater Ottawa area.

We provide high quality service and workmanship using the best available products. We Offer a 50 year non-prorated warranty on all shingle roofs.

For a limited time, we are offering 50% off gutter guard with eavestrough installation!

Our services include:
Free estimates
Re-roofing
New construction roofing
Ventilation installation
Flashing replacement
Skylight installation and replacement
Seamless evestrough installation
Ice and snow removal
service_area: Smiths Falls, Carleton Place, Beckwith, Richmond, Carp, Kanata, Ottawa, Orleans, Kemptville, Manotick. Everywhere between Smiths Falls and Embrun
products: Asphalt Shingles, Cedar Shake Shingles, Seamless eavestroughs, Vinyl siding, all different gauge metal soffit and fascia.
services: Roofing, Eavestroughing, Siding, Soffit and Fascia.
brands: Certainteed, Roxul, GAF, Royal, BP, Velux
specialities: Cedar Shake Roofing Systems, Mansard roofs, Seamless eavestroughs
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, e-transfer, MasterCard, Visa, AmEx
name: Kovar Contracting Inc
